# Introduction to R for Applied Epidemiology  


<img src = "https://github.com/appliedepi/epiRhandbook_eng/raw/master/images/Applied_Epi_logo.png" height = "200" align = "right">


[This website](https://appliedepi.github.io/emory_training) hosts training materials for "Introduction to R for Applied Epidemiologists". This course teaches the fundamentals of R for applied epidemiologists and public health practitioners.  

[**Applied Epi**](www.appliedepi.org) is a nonprofit organization supporting frontline practitioners through open-course analytical tools, training, and support. Our [Epidemiologist R Handbook](www.epirhandbook.com) is a free R reference manual which has been used by 130,000 people around the world.
